name: The Hermit Stalkers
description:
For GMTK 2020, this is a top down shooter where your tank is malfunctioning and out of control. 

Links don't work in the browser play. The game looks better in windows version, but I know its easier just to play the games in the browser. 

- Right click to move (When you are able to)

- Left click to shoot (When you can)

- Collect the cheese to win

Credits:

Models, Animating, Design, Writing, Developing: https://twitter.com/Vintage_Japes Me

Tools used: 

Blender

Unity

Clip Studio Paint

Game creator https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/game-creator-89443

SFX: Cafofo https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/interface-and-item-sounds-89646 

Ground textures used: Lumo-Art 3D https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/free-stylized-pbr-textures-pack-111778

Music: 

Scott Arc – Neon Quarter: https://youtu.be/qt3dqS4yapY

Synth Kid – They Mostly Come at Night... Mostly...: https://youtu.be/7BjtNk9lHuQ
